column4: Please read the wubi faq page.  It inmy opinion is NOT a good long term solution to running ubuntu.  And since you are out of room it seems you are using and liking it.
This laptop belongs to my parents and i am not allowed to install it fully
On my own computer i use Mac OS X (legally)
You are endangering thier laptop more by using wubi than you would if it were a regular instatll
